BUY - util.Constants.TransactionType
 
BuyBySip<T> - Class in stocks.model
Implements the PortfolioOperation interface and allows to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
BuyBySip(String, String, List<String>, String, String, double, double, List<TransactionItem>) - Constructor for class stocks.model.BuyBySip
Allows the user to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.

BuyByWeights<T> - Class in stocks.model
Implements the PortfolioOperation interface and allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.

Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
BuyByWeightsScreen - Class in stocks.view
Displays a GUI screen that allows user to buy multiple stocks in a single transaction based on weights.
